0xD3BC438F.name: OVERRIDE_POP_GROUPS

params.name: path
params.description: The file path to load (`popgroups`, `@resource/popgroups`), or `null` to reload the default population groups file.

0xD3BC438F.description: Replaces the `popgroups` (CPopGroupList) meta file with the file in the specified path.

examples.code:
-- fxmanifest.lua:
file 'popgroups_dlc.xml'

-- client.lua:
OverridePopGroups('popgroups_dlc.xml')

-- restore the original after five minutes
Wait(1000 * 60 * 5)
OverridePopGroups(nil)
